title: Castles
description: Luke and his forces have gained control of Frencolia. But Elliad has escaped, taking Princess Jobyna with him. Will she remain forever in Elliad's clutches?Jobyna meets the Czarevitch and Czarevna of Chezkovia. What dastardly plans are being hatched against their father, the Czar? Can Jobyna do anything to prevent Elliad increasing his power and dominion? What influence will 'The Crazy Prince' have on Jobyna's safety? Will she ever see her brother, Luke, again?
author: Carolyn Ann Aish
